column4: Any idea why before any sound is output I get static... or why my firefox crashes so much???
I was wondering if anyone knew why I get a weird static noise before any sound is made.
Anyone know why I get a weird static noise before any sound is made??

possibly a buggy driver for your sound card.  Do 'lspci' in a terminal to find out what your soundcard is, and then google to see if other people have experienced the same thing.  Try installing a different kernel and rebooting, and seeing if the problem goes away
